original_text: For I know him, that he will command his children and his household after him, and they shall keep the way of the Lord, to do justice and judgment; that the Lord may bring upon Abraham that which he hath spoken of him.
korean_text: 내가 그로 그 자식과 권속에게 명하여 여호와의 도를 지켜 공의와 정의를 행하게 하려고 그를 택하였나니 이는 나 여호와가 아브라함에게 대하여 말한 일을 이루려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: that he will command his children
and they shall keep the way of the Lord
that the Lord may bring upon Abraham
that which he hath spoken of him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에 대해 말씀하신 모든 것을 이루려 하심이라
